page.title: 06POLICE IN BUCKHURST HILL
page.content: The local police station has 30-40 constables,who work 8 hour shifts.The station has 4-5 Pandas,a station van & 1-2 Rovers. In this area the commonest crime is buglary as we have many large detached houses.There is also a problem with thefts from cars in station car parks.Drugs do not seem to be a problem,but there is a bit of glue sniffing.We do not have many muggings but handbags have been snatched.No recent murders. There are still too many accidents on the road,about a thousand injuries a year.Few children are run over even though traffic is heavy in the area,it is mostly local and commuter traffic.heavy lorries have been reduced as they now go on the M11 & M25 motorways.
